title: Private Network Says Offline and Cannot Turn Back On
content:
today at about 7pm(central) I was browsing on autozone.com when I got a popup that said my something about my network needed attention. I noticed that my Firefox Private Network was off. I tried to turn it on and it kept going back to OFF. exited Firefox and restarted. problem still there. rebooted computer, started Firefox browser, problem still there. Donâ€™t enable HTTPS-Only Mode selected still have the problem..

system info: windows 7 home prem 64 bit Firefox Browser 94.0.2(64-bit)
creator: uneekii_1

title: Yahoo
content: I can't access Yahoo in any form all other websites work fine.
creator: rutz33

title: Primary Password not accepted after 94.0.2 update
content:
I just updated to 94.0.2 and now it is prompting for my primary password as usual but it is not accepting it.I've entered it hundreds of times and it is definitely the one I always use for this browser. I'm locked out and don't want to have to reset and lose my data. It was working fine before the update. I tried doing a refresh and it didn't change anything.

Please help

UPDATE: after about 25 times it stopped asking. No idea why
creator: nhutchings1895
